name: Lil' Raiders
description:
Four lil' bomb -toting raiders enter the caves, only 1 can be left standing.

This project was made for a local game jam. It can be playaed with less than 4 people, but the extra characters will sit in the corners, undisturbed. It was also made to ONLY use controllers, we used PS4 controllers and the DS4 program, but any windows/xbox controller should work.

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE WILL NOT WORK.

Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Look
Left Trigger (L2) - Lock a rock permanently
Right Trigger (R2) - Drag a rock behind you
A (X) - Place bomb
Select (Share) - Begin new round
